attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I opened this app and it wouldn’t load so i waited a while while i did work around the house and about 2 and a half hours later it still wasn’t working. I went and got some food and when i got home my phone wouldn’t turn on no matter what i did. So I had to take it to verizon so they could help me and my phone is brand new so this app will mess up your phone DO NOT GET IT.

attributes.title: The WORST app EVER
attributes.review: This app made my phone get 36 viruses that weren’t even there and they had also gave me a whole bunch of nudes of some random people and a couple of the so called “president”. This app also made me loose all my friends and made me want to kill myself. The app also made my dog run away with my boy friend along with our fridge and our microwave also along with our stove and oven well he took the house too

This is the WORST app ever!!! When I tried to get into the app at first it wouldn’t load! Then when it finally loaded the first thing me and my 6-year-old Elizabeth Nicole saw was Trumps face! It made her cry!!! My older daughter Tesla always calls him Cheeto boy and now I see why!! This app deserves to be taken down and whoever said it was a good idea should be fired!!! So go back to your bunker, bunker boy!!! My name is Karen and I above this message!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: I hate it
attributes.review: I opened the app And my hiccups literally stopped cause of how much I got scared of The deformed looking orange man I saw. I never seen such a ugly personal like this ever in my life. APPLE IF YOU DONT DELETE THIS APP FROM THE APPLE STORE I AM SUEING U GUYS FOR GIVING ME A HEART ATTACK LIKE This is The worst app I ever seen . this all needs to be delete off the App Store ASAP. I’m every upset this app is even on the apple store, apple do better and get this app of the App Store pls ,  sincerely the girl that almost had heart attack

attributes.title: Horror
attributes.review: This is probably the most horrifying and disgusting thing I’ve ever had the unfortunate ability to see. I saw it and was instantly nauseous I couldn’t even function for a few hours the tragedy of what I was put through in witnessing this is truly horrifying. Please I beg of you never download this app it is possibly the worst thing you could ever do to your mind and will forever leave you traumatized.

attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.title: THIS DOWNLOADED A VIRUS ON MY PHONE
attributes.review: As a die hard Trump supporter (#MAGA), I expected great things from this app, however it destroyed my phone. Once I downloaded it, my screen froze and a picture of a scary Cheeto man covered my screen. It was absolutely terrifying. I see this scary Oompa Loompa man whenever I close my eyes at night and I haven’t been able to sleep in weeks. So thank you, Mr. President, for absolutely ruining my life. Thank you. I wish I could rate this a 0.

attributes.title: just no..
attributes.review: Made my phone glitch like crazy! When I opened the app I saw some really old orange dude and it scared me! When my dog saw the thing in my screen it farted then passed out from how smelly and gross the photo is 🤢 When I closed the app and opened it again I saw the same man NAKED and getting a spray tan. Luckily there was barley anything cause the dude had a 🍤 pp but I saw a singularly ball and decided enough was enough. I’m now traumatized 😔 DON’T GET THIS APP UNLESS YOU ARE MENTALLY INSANE

attributes.title: Horrific🧚‍♀️💫
attributes.review: i opened up the app just to see a wrinkly orange smiling. my eyes burned and my soul was taken from my body. my mom had to take me to the er because i was throwing up so much after seeing a Cheeto on my screen for to long. my insides still are twisting at the thought of the horrible site of a Cheeto. and don’t get me started on the photo of him spray tanning naked. i have to now get double eye survey because they were severely damaged
